thread.title: Ashok Lakkaraju
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Ashok Lakkaraju

author: Ashok Lakkaraju
title: Ashok Lakkaraju
text:
I have moved from one city to another within Michigan. I have ordered furniture from Gardner White and the experience has been nothing but excellent.
Received an email with the items ordered in the morning g with a couple of automated updates on what time I will receive the furniture. Was even provided the tracking tool to see where the truck was while enroute.
The whole delivery was very smooth.
